data.title: Dallas TX - IT Support & Consulting
data.meta_description: We are new to the area and having a tough time finding a company with the requirements our company desires. We have Tried other companies but they are not what we are looking for in support. Are there any other companies…
data.text:
We are new to the area and having a tough time finding a company with the requirements our company desires. We have Tried other companies but they are not what we are looking for in support. Are there any other companies in the area that you can send me please reply back with.

Thanks

Well, it would be nice to know what exactly you are looking for.

Dell/Perot Systems and HP/EDS are in town, can do anything, but might be beyond what you need.
